name: groceries-food
descriptions: this expense category covers amounts spent on groceries like food.

name: utilities
descriptions: this expense category covers hydro, water, and gas utilities.

name: rent
description: this expense category covers rental expense if you are renting a property from a landlord (i.e. you pay rent).

name: mortgage
description: this expense category covers the payments you make towards your mortgage. note this API does not support splitting values into asset and expense categories.

name: insurance
description: this expense category covers all insurance related payments (i.e. car insurance, home insurance, condo insurance, health insurance, etc).

name: interest
description: this expense category covers interest expenses that are charged to bank, credit-card, or line-of-credit accounts. you can also classify insurance premium and tax charges related to the payment accounts here as well.

name: transit/travel
description: this expense category covers items like bus/TTC fares, uber/lyft/taxi rides (including tips), air plane tickets, etc.

name: laundry
description: this expense category covers all expenses incurred related to laundry. this includes laundry power, charges for using laundry machines, dry cleaning charges, maintanence for laundry machines (if you have one), etc.

name: groceries-other
description: this expense category covers all groceries that don't fall under food. this can include dish washing detergent, toilet cleaning detergent, soap, toothpaste, etc.

name: phone/communication
description: this category covers expenses related to your home phone, cell phone, and internet.

name: charitable donations
description: this category covers all charitable donations.

name: medical
description: this category covers all medical related expenses (i.e. dental, optomitrist, medicine, physiotherapy, etc.)

name: fitness-related
description: this category covers all expenses you incur to stay active. this can include gym memberships, equipment purchase, dues for a softball team, etc.

name: personal/entertainment
description: this category covers expense that were incurred for personal enjoyment. this can include things like movie tickets, perfume, etc.

name: large-expenses
description: this category covers expenses incurred once in a while. it can include things like purchasing furniture.

name: education
description: this category includes funds spent on tuition fees, books, conference fees, etc.

name: other-expense
description: this category is a catch all for when you are unable to classify things anywhere else. (i.e. gifts purchased for firends, etc.)

name: pet-food
description: this category covers expenses for pet food and treats.

name: pet-other
description: this category covers expenses for all other pet realted purchase. (i.e. water fountain, toys, etc.)

name: pet-medical
description: this category covers expenses related to medical expenses for pets (i.e. VET visits, dental cleaning, medicines, etc.). you can also choose to classify pet insurance here.

name: third-party
description: this is for expenses incurred on behalf of someone else.

name: other-income
description: same as misc-income category.

name: employment-income
description: this income category is for money received from a job you are employed at.

name: misc-income
description: this income category is for money received which cannot be categorized in any other income categories (i.e. tax refund).
